website_summaries.verdict: While it has some flaws, it's worth a look if a lighter colored seat cover will match your pet's fur and vehicle interior.
pros: Customers who own pets with light colored fur praise this cover's likewise light color for concealing hair
Material has a slip-resistant backing to help keep it in place
Price falls in the middle of the spectrum
cons: Though said to be waterproof, moisture has been reported to soak throughout it
May not entirely cover large seats such as those in trucks

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy kit
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. This is not a soft plush cover, rather a study, easy clean material that my dog's hair does not stick to, yea! The material also had a nice texture to keep my pet from sliding around in the back seat. Overall great value, good product.
customer_reviews.author: bill wagner

customer_reviews.title: Turns out that the cover here is superior, and feel and look substantially thicker
customer_reviews.text: Bought a popular sellers black hammock style pet seat cover, the black covers are ubiquitous on Amazon so I bought the one with most reviews. That hammock is ok but... I bought this makers hammock because it was in a light color, for summer heat with the convertible top down. Turns out that the cover here is superior, and feel and look substantially thicker. The cinch straps for the head rests are a much more broad and thick and the clips larger and more substantial. The width seems less than the black hammock so I would say this light color might make for a slightly smaller coverage. This is a very good product value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Pet Magasin fit's my Nissan Altima nicely
customer_reviews.text: The Pet Magasin fit's my Nissan Altima nicely. The tan color also goes well in the tan interior. PROS: Far less expensive than most competitors. Nice color that matched my Nissan interior perfectly. Looks like it was designed for the interior. Decent, semi-sturdy, nonrip material covers the back seat now. It has large disconnect snaps, so passenger can easily get in the back seat if needed. CONS: None so far. BOTTOMLINE: This is a nice looking, inexpensive, SEMI-durable Dog Taco. NOTE: I bought a similar product that did not have quick release snaps. That seat cover also had its straps disintegrate in less than 6 months. These products are not all the same.
customer_reviews.author: Bubbalicious

customer_reviews.title: Great for Travel!
customer_reviews.text: This seat cover is perfect! I love that it has handles that tuck into the seat gap to keep it in place. It is perfect when we travel no matter how far we will be going. The straps that go around the head rests help keep it up and the front keeps our dog off the console where she would be normally. It also keeps her from getting into the foot area (and getting stuck lol). It washes well and holds up to dirt, sand, etc. Great choice to keep your car relatively hair-free. (Dog owners know your car will NEVER be hair free :)).
customer_reviews.author: jaq

customer_reviews.title: Another seat cover that falls apart.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Pet Magasin seat cover for my wife's Jeep Cherokee. It did what it was supposed to - protect the seat from a messy dog. Unfortunately, the backing has come off in sheets and flakes all over the seat and floor. The seat cover is no longer waterproof and must be thrown out. I won't order this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Raoulthefoul

customer_reviews.title: Great Back Seat Pet Cover for Cars
customer_reviews.text: I had a wonderful purchasing experience. The transaction was easy. The item arrived quickly. I'm impressed with the quality of this product given the reasonable price point. I wanted a light color (which is hard to find), durable, and waterproof pet cover for the back seat of my nearly new car. The cover fits the back seats very well, the anchors and the headrest cables are easy to install, and allow for a costume finished fit/look. The material feels very durable and thick, yet it is soft on the top side. I'm glad I made this purchase and will now looking into buying the front car seat cover by the same manufacturer and same vendor.
customer_reviews.author: spynovel_junkie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic cover!
customer_reviews.text: I had been given a cover by a friend when I got my new car, so that I could control my service dog's hair getting everywhere but it just didn't work right, so my hunt began. This one has sturdy clasps that aren't going to break anytime soon. The fabric isn't overly slippery and has a nice feel to it. I love that I can either let the front portion hang long or attach it to the headrests on the front seats. Even more important to me is that it covers my entire back seat. Other ones that I have tried fell a couple inches short on each side, and that kind of defeated the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Grey

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Very easy to install or remove
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Very easy to install or remove. I have large German Shepherd and Beagle. Often load up both dogs and can honestly say this mat has saved the leather seats in the back of my car. The design of the cover prevents dogs from falling into backseat floor board and keeps dogs from jumping into front seats. Cover stays in place when traveling with dogs. Best $26 I've ever spent on pet related purchases. Excellent value for the dollar! I would highly recommend this product for any pet owner in need of a pet cover for a "bench" type back seat. I use this in my 4 door Toyota Camry and 4 door Honda Accord. Chuck.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great product for your car -- will not fit your full-size truck
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, and the company obviously takes great pride in its products and customer care. I'm only giving it 4 stars because the advertising irritated me. I originally purchased this for my full size truck. The advertising indicates it fits cars, trucks and SUVs, so I assumed it would fit my truck. I wish it had clarified 'cars, mid-sized and smaller trucks, and some SUVs'. Fortunately, I also needed one for my car. Works great in my car, contains all of that precious dog hair, drool and dirt from our trips outdoors. Pretty easy on and off and saves a lot of cleanup time. Totally recommend for your car.
customer_reviews.author: KaraDub

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping hair of seats and keeping dog in place
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have a 10lbs dog that loves to ride it the back of the car. I felt awful the day I had to break hard and she fell on the floor. I have a car seat for her and she will use it, but she would rather be in the back. I bought this item Jan 2017 and it still works and looks great. And we have driven across the country and back. Oh which makes me think, it's also great for hiding items that you place on the floor of your back seat... Now that's an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: jeepgirl

customer_reviews.title: Dog tested and approved!
customer_reviews.text: My seat is protected, and my dog cannot place her paws on my front console, so I feel she is safer. Muddy paw prints do not reach the seat, and have wiped off easily. My suggestions for improvement would be a small mesh area to allow the back A/C vent to blow through, and for the instructions to tell me what the sections of pipe are for. My dog is medium-sized, about 38 pounds. Very easy & quick to install, adjust, remove, reinstall. I use it in hammock style. I have owned this for about 6 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: CathyLou

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the seat cover to go on a 3,600 mile road trip with my large male labrador. The cover is well made and fit perfectly in my SUV. Its now 7 months later and the cover shows no signs of wear. It also cleans up well in the washing machine. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk Pitt

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I installed the cover according to instructions, but my dog hated the "hammock." I detached the front seat straps and let the cover just drape down to the floor. Both my dog and I like it better that way. I like the light color because it will stay cooler. So many other seat covers are black. The fabric is soft and doesn't make a "crunchy" sound when my dog moves around on it. I only gave 3 stars on water resistance and easy to clean because I haven't experienced those things yet.
customer_reviews.author: Eyleen Nadolny

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cover!
customer_reviews.text: Received the Pet Cover on time and in good shape, wrapped in plastic bag. It was clean and folded nicely. It fit our 2014 Corolla perfectly and our large Samoyed girl loves it. She's getting older and has a little trouble getting up into the car now but this cover doesn't hinder her in any way and it covers the seats nicely. The cover is not slippery, has a little padding and seems to be constructed well. It is easy to install, only took a couple of minutes, and is just as easy to remove, if you want to store it in the trunk. Very nice cover!
customer_reviews.author: D. Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay in place.
customer_reviews.text: I have a sedan and a medium-size dog, and every time my dog got in the vehicle the seat covered moved. The color is about all that was nice, I couldn't see the dog hair. The material is sturdy and great for a much smaller dog. I ended up returning and getting a much better product. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: M. Weingardt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Pets and Car Seat Friendly
customer_reviews.text: This cover matches my light interior, and the seat belt Velcro lines up perfectly with car seat anchor latches! When I installed this, I think I heard my car audibly thank me. It’s finally fully covered from the mayhem my dog and baby bring into it.
customer_reviews.author: Mundai

customer_reviews.title: Attractive....for a back seat cover!
customer_reviews.text: My car's interior is beige taupe gray tan....like so many new cars...so I didn't want another black seat cover for the back seat. My standard poodle and I drive to the park everyday for our walk and she picks up dirt and lawn debris like a dust buster. This cover fits well, is not slippery and seems to resist all manner of doggie efforts to mess it up thoroughly. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda O Craig

customer_reviews.title: Seam ripped within first 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this based on the great reviews. Sadly, I have only had it a couple of weeks and it is already torn at the seam where my dog jumps into the back seat. Granted he is an 80# dog but is calm in the car. I didn’t keep the packaging so I don’t think I can return it. Anyway maybe a fluke but very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Jeep Grand Cherokee perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the price and I thought/hoped it would match my beige interior. It's actually pretty light colored and more yellowish, but that's ok because it fits great and appears to be of good quality. Te plastic tubes on the back are pushed in between the seat and seat back to hold it snugly in place. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: MSM

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to use it as seat cover & it doesn’t stay in place as well as I would like. There is no place to attach cover at ...
customer_reviews.text: If I had wanted only a hammock I would give it 5Stars. I wanted to use it as seat cover & it doesn’t stay in place as well as I would like. There is no place to attach cover at the bottom of the seat. With that said we purchased two for both cars & are keeping both of them. Our dog jumped right in with no problem. Also the video only covers the hammock so I can’t find out if we installed cover incorrectly for use as seat cover. As a hammock five stars. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Marstan

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work..
customer_reviews.text: The cover is super easy to install and so far it seems to hold up well to wet, dirty paws. The only downside is I don’t think it’s a universal fit for all cars. My dog has found a way to burrow in between the cover and the door so he can get down into the foot well behind the drivers seat but it might be because my drivers seat is far up. Not sure. It’s protecting my seats so that’s all I care about
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Great! Looks exactly like the picture and does the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great! Looks exactly like the picture and does the job. We have 2 dogs and my husband wanted beige seats on the new car we bought so needed something for dogs in the backseat to keep seats clean. If remember you could do a hammock type thing with cover but with one of our dogs weighing 110 lbs thought the 2 of them might be pulling cover off clips with the weight so happy the way it is just hanging over the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Cathi

customer_reviews.title: Great seat cover!
customer_reviews.text: We love the pet seat cover! I recently got a new car with light color leather seats. Our yard has been extremely wet and muddy this year and we didn’t want our dogs to get the seats all messed up and towels or blankets don’t do the trick. The cover works great and I really like that it blends in with the interior and isn’t black. The straps keep it in place nicely and it is easy to remove as well. I also like the anchors which keep it in place. We are very satisfied and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Good car seat cover for the money. Like the other reviews, yes it has a slight plastic smell but quickly disappears after airing it out. Yes, makes scratching noise from rough paw pads. It's a little annoying but I just put a fleece blanket on top. I don't allow unruly behavior in the car so not certain if it's durable enough for rowdy dogs but definitely a good buy to keep dirt, hair and claw marks off the seat - so giving it 4 stars for questionable durability. Perfectly fits my Mercedes Benz C-series
customer_reviews.author: Rogers Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I haven’t used the seat cover yet. However, I am very impressed by the quality of the materials as well as the ease of attaching it to the headrests. I bought this particular cover because it is the perfect color for the ivory leather seats in my Honda CRV. I have a white mini poodle with the typical poodle toenails. Therefore, I need to protect the seats from his enthusiastic car behavior! I expect this seat cover will be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Hermine I. Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: Durable, good fit
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for the backseat of my sedan. The securing clips are all positioned perfectly for the front and back head rests. The beige color looks nice and provides a good contrast from my black interior. I have two big puppies and they both love to rest on it. Easy to fold back up when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Ian G

customer_reviews.title: Nice to Look At but not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The cover tore the first week we got it. In addition, cleaning it is absolutely a nightmare especially the beige color. And the antislip rollups didn’t work despite us tucking all the way in, so leather seat on the left side is completely tore up. I wouldn’t recommend also because it doesn’t have the side flaps
customer_reviews.author: Imani T

customer_reviews.title: Good value and quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t intend to use this for a Pet. I use the back seat of my car in my sales & service field work. My back seat is best during rain since it keeps my supplies dry. There are a lot of these types of covers on the market, some more expensive and some very cheap. For the money this one is probably the best value and quality for the cost. I particularly like the light color which matches the car interior and does not get hot in the sun like dark colored ones.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H. Rief

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Adjusting the buckles is a bit of a pain, but once they're adjusted they're ok. We have a mid size sedan (older Toyota camry) and it's not a perfect fit but it works just fine for our purposes (transporting wet muddy dogs). A younger more active dog might be able to move the cover around enough to get dirt on the seat though.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice looking, appears to not collect too much hair and by only securing it around one of the front headrests, my doggie and see through between the seats and get some air as well. Sure this will be great during hot hot Vegas summer!
customer_reviews.author: J Adams

customer_reviews.title: exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my back seat, GREAT price and matches my dogs fur! Looks like this will clean easily -Bought this as replacement for one that cost way more , had pockets that we never used, but that disintegrated when I tried to clean it. And it came incredibly quick!
customer_reviews.author: leep

customer_reviews.title: A must have for Furry pet owners
customer_reviews.text: This is a must for traveling with my husky. I have cream leather seats, and this cover and done a terrific job of keeping them scratch and dirt free. Whenever my pup hops in with his muddy paws I don’t even bat an eyelash. Plus with the set up being so easy I can fold it up and put it in my trunk whenever I have passengers.
customer_reviews.author: Noniebonie

customer_reviews.title: Wilson likes it!
customer_reviews.text: This is made of sturdy material and I was happily surprised to see little grips on the bottom so that it doesn’t slide everywhere. Overall seems to be a great product, good bye hair in my car! The only reason for the one less star is I don’t have head rests in the back seat of my car and I had to use zip ties to fasten it to the car seat anchor, not a big deal but I wish the clip was smaller to fasten it without zip ties.
customer_reviews.author: Krob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have a new Mercedes 350 and was looking for a backseat cover. I did not want to spend over 250-300 dollars for a cover made specifically for my car. I found this cover from Pet Megasin and it's perfect!! The color matched great and the quality is a thick quilt that covers back of front seat too or I can fold down to just cover the back. Highly recommended, fast shipping too.
customer_reviews.author: FPC

customer_reviews.title: I've recommended it to several friends
customer_reviews.text: This fit my Chevy Equinox perfectly! It really helped my Labrador to stay in the seat on long trips and help all his toys to not fall off the seat too. I got this color because you can't see his yellow fur all over it. I've recommended it to several friends! UPDATE: A few months and many car rides later, the seam by the seat has started to tear. My 70lb lab likes to stand right there with his head out the window. Helps to keep him steady but I guess it's just too much weight. I am now looking for a way to repair it that will be effective.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie MTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, fits my dodge ram to a tee. Couldnt be happier with it. Well made, easybto install and remove, to clean all of the above. My 100 pound golden retriever cant competit with it lol. Highly recommend. Great for groceries too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice-looking and sturdy seat cover, for the price. The quilted cover makes it look much more expensive, and I like that the light color keeps my pup from getting as hot. It's easy to detach the front from the headrests and use it as a normal seat cover, without the hammock feature. We've been using it about twice a week for the last 2 months, and it looks as good as new (well, it is a little muddy at this point. We'll rinse it off soon).
customer_reviews.author: R. E. Pope

customer_reviews.title: User friendly to all seat cover
customer_reviews.text: I really liked how easy it was to install the seat cover in my 4 runner. Between my dog and grand-kids this seat-cover was a great investment and I really like it. It also gives you the opportunity to contain your pet if they get dirty so they aren't hopping all over the vehicle. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a seat cover for their vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hagen

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, but it does the job.  I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Material is thin and flimsy. Lack of weight makes it shifty when the dog jumps in and shifty and blowy if the windows are down. But it does the job. And as these things always need replacing, I will use it until it rips. I will not buy it again. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna Mungo

customer_reviews.title: Material is slick
customer_reviews.text: The vendor was fine but I returned this product. The material is very slick and I wanted something that has a nap on it. My dogs beds slide on the leather seats and I want something that will help hold the beds in place. This isn’t it.
customer_reviews.author: candicemh

customer_reviews.title: Time Will Tell
customer_reviews.text: Awful odor out of the package, I have rinsed it with a little detergent and it rinsed easier with the hose. The seat cover has mostly plastic in the material, therefore it will be easy to clean, ie vacuum or hose off the animal hairs. Anyone who has had problems with the sun beating down on the car might want to give us a heads up as to how the material holds up. Does it get too hot for the dogs
customer_reviews.author: No. Cal.

customer_reviews.title: It does what it is advertised to do.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. I wish it was a bit easier to tighten the attachments. Easy to brush off loose dirt. Its fine, does the job. Not great, not bad. Just a simple protector for leather seats. Color is nice, matches car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great seat cover
customer_reviews.text: Looked at several before picking this one as the best combination of features and price. Had to air it out right after it arrived- strong plastic smell- but it fits and works perfectly. It's easy to install and remove, works for backseat or cargo area, has several handy features for customization, is comfortable for the pup, and appears to be quite durable.
customer_reviews.author: COURTNEY

customer_reviews.title: The quality seems really good and exactly what I need for my two smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received this in the mail and put it in my car to try it out. The quality seems really good and exactly what I need for my two smaller French bulldogs. It fits pretty well in the back of my car, although it is slightly big, I have a Fiat, so my car is very tiny. The size doesn't bother me. I just tucked in the little extra material in between my seats and it looks perfect. I can't wait to take my pups out and about and try it out. :D
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Seat Cover
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. My only concern, not complaint, is that when you run it through the wash (even on a delicate cycle) the grippy bits on the back come off.
customer_reviews.author: thrifty32

customer_reviews.title: Saves my car's leather seats!
customer_reviews.text: I have a big dog that loves to ride with me in the car. But I drive a vintage model car and his claws were damaging the leather seats. This cover is the perfect solution. It's not too hard to install and stays put. It's easy to take out when you want to bring humans in the car!
customer_reviews.author: rabidreader

customer_reviews.title: Great Seat Cover
customer_reviews.text: Like the look. Very nice material. Color a little more yellow than I thought. It is a little narrow for my seat but still works well to corral my Dog who always wants to jump from back to front. Keeps the seat in my new car clean. Great product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Smith

customer_reviews.title: This item is very nice and it came on time
customer_reviews.text: This item is very nice and it came on time... The problem I have is that because the ends don't tie down to the ends of the seat... It's always out of wack... It just doesn't give good coverage of the back seat for me... Next time I'll choose a different one. Thanks sorry but it's not what I thought it would be...
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effective
customer_reviews.text: The pet sat cover was easy to install and adjust. I like that it has an opening for the dog seat belts to pass thru. We are using it hammock style and it is successfully containing the dog hair and drool that I have to contend with. I’m very pleased with the product quality and I recommend it for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Geiman

customer_reviews.title: Very Strong Odor
customer_reviews.text: Just received this today. Looks great...well-made & durable. But the reviewer who wrote about the strong plastic odor sure was right! There's no way I could have that odor in my car since I'm olfactory-sensitive. I've given it a wash & it's drying/airing outside as we speak. We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Go Ask Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Great for our big pup
customer_reviews.text: This is just what we needed for our 60lb Sheppard puppy. She loves going "bye-bye" in the car, but we didn't want our tan leather seats getting torn up and soiled. We use the hammock option to keep her secure and out of the front seat. Have not tried washing yet, so can't speak to how it will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Susi

customer_reviews.title: Leather Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: We have two dogs and this hammock has saved the back of our seats. First off, it keeps them from crawling into the front seats which is huge for safety. Second, it has protected our seats from nails digging into them, dirt, puke, and stepped in poo. This thing washes off brand new every time! It's incredibly easy to set up and folds nicely into the back of the trunk. We have a Ford Fushion and it covers the entire back row. Two paws up!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Happy pup in a quality car hammock
customer_reviews.text: Great bang for the buck. Quality is there, and seams seem strong. Time will tell, but pleased for now. 50# nsdtr happy with her new car accessory:)
customer_reviews.author: J. Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a better review if it didn’t already come with a stain on it. As soon as we opened it we saw the stain but we didn’t want to go through the hassle of returning & plus we needed it for a trip. It’s not entirely water proof, you have to clean it up quick but overall we are happy that it stays in place bc of the clips vs putting a sheet or blanket on
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for the right dig cover for about 6 months. finally found it. I have an aussie who love the water and mud puddles. so needless to say the cover has to be tuff and stay put. thanks its saving my back seat. Subaru forester ❣
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I buy this years ago!
customer_reviews.text: Really love the color, especially with the hot Texas sun beating down and I like that my dogs aren't sliding around. I do put their beds in the back for them in top of the cover so they have a comfy ride but I love protecting the back seat of my car with this hammock. Looks really nice, easy to put in and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Lapinski

customer_reviews.title: Good product I would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I have a golden retriever and when i take her to dog beach i dont have to worry about my back seats getting sandy or dirty. I am an owner of a ford edge (suv) and i prefer the bottom part down just bc it barley reaches to clip on to the driver and passenger bckseats. The only downside is that it might be a little slippery when they stand on it and you are driving so make sure you buy them a seatbelt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Supports my 4 dogs on it!
customer_reviews.text: It looks a little cheaper in person but does the job. I wish it was a little wider for the span of the backseat (I have an average size car : Kia Optima). My one dog isn’t as behaved and can easily go from underneath the seat cover to on top whenever she pleases (she’s bad!).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my whole car smells terrible, like moth balls on steroids
customer_reviews.text: Fits in my Subaru Impreza well, and is a similar color to the interior, haven't tried it our with the dog yet but I can't imagine any problems. The only complaint I have is the awful smell! My god, my whole car smells terrible, like moth balls on steroids! I tried febreezing it once and it didn't do much. really hoping it just needs some time to air out.
customer_reviews.author: ash

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: Love that it’s light weight and size fits great in my Mazda CX-5. My Shepherd gets in and settles right in on it. I have not used the seat belt tie does as my dog is tethered in another way with more freedom of movement. It can be set up hammock style, but I have not done that. Very nice and great price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Snowbird

customer_reviews.title: Great design!
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat cover. It is easy to instal and remove. Our pup has motion sickness so it is imperative to have something that won't let water penetrate to the car seat. I use a removable blanket over the seat and the little wetness that might seep through is stopped by the seat cover.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: Great looking product!
customer_reviews.text: I have just received this product. It did install easily. I do not know yet how resistant it is or how easy to clean. When I get the opportunity to do so I will pass on an eval.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Marcotte

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the back seats
customer_reviews.text: Great durable quality. The cover has two small secure bars to place in between the seats to hold in place and has adjustable straps that clip around front seats' and back seats' head rests. I love the hammock effect so that the back of the front seats are protected ( also helps deter a hyper MinPin from being able to jump up front). It can even hide objects in your car that you don't want seen by placing them on the back seat floor. I will take pictures soon to show what I am describing.
customer_reviews.author: SariphineTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Performs above expectation
customer_reviews.text: This hammock seat cover contains fur, dirty footprints, protects the seat from scratches, and keeps my dog from coming up front! Cover is tough, non-slippery on one side and rubberized on the other side which keeps it in place. Super easy to set up and take down! Shake the cover and fold it up to be put away. My car looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Suzan

customer_reviews.title: I am a first-time user of this product. It ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a first-time user of this product. It appears very durable, but have not used it as of yet. The packaging did not include installation instructions. The video was ok, but did not show how to use the seatbelt inserts or the other parts on the underside near the Velcro openings.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Todhunter

customer_reviews.title: All the features of the higher priced and more!
customer_reviews.text: We'll made, stays put, easy clean up and looks good! Adjusted quickly and can be used hammock style or not. Dog is comfy and safe cause she doesn't slide around. What else do you need?!
customer_reviews.author: Stark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect car cover for my big boy Rex
customer_reviews.text: Great for my RAV4. The beige color match the interior color of my car perfectly. Easy to set up and remove.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually non-slid, even on leather seats, which is a huge bonus for big dogs! And I love that the hooks for the headrests unbuckle for easy setting up and taking down. Waterproof and thick, sturdy. Very happy with my purchase. Fits my GMC Terrain well.
customer_reviews.author: Amy R

customer_reviews.title: As advertized
customer_reviews.text: Solid product that will definitely keep my seats safe. It would be nice if there was a side flap as I've noticed the back seats are not completely covered and my pup generally jumps up on the ends of the seat itself.
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: Great cover. Had a small issue and the company backed it 100%. We love it and so do our dogs!
customer_reviews.author: The Ern

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one that I have purchased for my vehicles. Outstanding product that I highly recommend. I have a large Rottweiler and a German Shepherd. The cover does not move around at all on the back seats. Very good product !
customer_reviews.author: RevBrit

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, easy to put into the car and dog loves the softness. Bought a second one for a friends
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Boston

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the price! We've had ours for 9 months now and it has started to deteriorate a bit (we use it a lot!), but overall it is still doing the job. Only other complaint is that it is a bit short and doesn't cover the edges of my seats (standard sedan car).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daughter's pet loves it
customer_reviews.text: Fit my daughter's Kia optima just fine and her 50lb. pet pup loves it
customer_reviews.author: T.W.Y.70

customer_reviews.title: No dog...just messy toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I am sure this would work for a dog, but we bought it to keep our seats clean from messy toddlers. It worked great and although eventually gets stained, the stains did not go thru to the seats
customer_reviews.author: M. Huxley

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Mazda CX 3 perfectly, it keeps my ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Mazda CX 3 perfectly, it keeps my dogs toys/chews from constantly falling on the floor too. I haven't had it long, so we'll see how it stands up to the test of time! Appears well made, and the straps adjust up tight enough to pull the cover up under the head rest too.
customer_reviews.author: ricbro

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat cover
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned it in the washing machine and dried it in the dryer. Fit the back seat of my small SUV perfectly. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Held up so far, to more than just the dog.
customer_reviews.text: Fit well in our VW jetta. Have not washed it yet. Helps protect the back seat from all kinds of stuff. Also like the hammock part too, but the dog was afraid of it at first. Not the products fault. Will re-review after we have washed it a few times.
customer_reviews.author: RPBIllinois

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs and saved me a ton of hair/dirt on seats
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. My car was constantly getting dirty from my dog. This was a lifesaver and super simple to setup!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer E.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for travelling with dogs
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this product! We have a 50 pound puppy that likes to ride but wants to climb in my lap while I'm driving. he has also had issues with getting car sick. Now he can ride in the back seat and this seat cover prevents him from crossing over to the front. It also is a good quality fabric that protects my seats from his nails and if he gets sick, I'm not having to scrub the vehicle like I did before.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie A. Morrow

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with this purchase.....
customer_reviews.text: The cover fits perfectly, was easy to install, seems to be well made, wasn't over priced, and looks good as well
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT INVESTMENT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for my needs. Thanks for a great and reasonably priced product.
customer_reviews.author: Elston Jones

customer_reviews.title: 3000 miles on first use
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought a new car and we were taking a 3000 mile journey in it with an elderly dog and a puppy and wife had concerns about her new seats . This protected them from accidents and slobber. Dogs loved riding on it also. The lighter color made it cooler for them.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Doss

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase this item again ! Great gift for someone with a pet
customer_reviews.text: I have a Boxer who is in and out of the car on several occasions;!great for protecting the back seats and protecting her from going into the floor ; nice quality and excellent price!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Love!!! Super durable and installs in seconds. I love the handles to put in the seats so that it stays in place. It also have buckle openings!!! Also the rubber on the bottom to keep it from sliding. Amazing product for an awesome price!
customer_reviews.author: Madison Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Not really what we needed...
customer_reviews.text: For the back of our Camry, and really not working. Can't attach at the base of back seat, and at top, the connectors should have had elastic. Our GSD slides about somewhat. Will have to add Velcro at base, elastic at top, and fix myself.
customer_reviews.author: NanaCO

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cover
customer_reviews.text: This backseat cover not only looks nice but perfectly protects my seats from my dog's dirty paws and hair. Easy to clean with a wet wipe. This affordable and well-made product is pet approved! Extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: LJ BEAR

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice seat cover. Great quality. I can tell it's going to last a very long time and it's designed very well. It also doubles as a cover for stuff I may not want prying eyes to see in the back of the Supercrew cab. I would definitely buy it again but unless I get a second truck; I probably won't need to.
customer_reviews.author: R.M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome !
customer_reviews.text: Could not be more pleased. I drive 2017 Ford Superduty,large back seat area. I was concerned about the fit. Perfect! I have two dogs and one is always trying to jump onto the console and I am fighting her off. With this sling setup, not only does it prevent her from getting up front,it also protects them from falling to the floor if ai brake too quickly. I totally recommend this ,wish I had found it years ago. I will always have one and I';m ordering another for my wife"s SUV. thanks guys,great idea and design! Roger Lawson -Dallas,Texas
customer_reviews.author: Roger L.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this car seat cover.
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the car seat cover. It's pretty easy to put on and keeps the dirty away from back seat.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: Great cover, easy to put on, washable, water resistant, and all that for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great back seat cover for even better price! Machine washable, water resistant, easy to put on... Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandra

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat for dogs as it stops my dog from falling in the floor if I need to stop short. It is well made.
customer_reviews.author: fortune88

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the quality of this product overall. I have a Kia Sedona so it does NOT cover the whole middle bench area. There are about 2 inches on each side left uncovered.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Bargain Seat Cover for My Dog
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cover for my car. I drive a BMW X3 and was afraid the cover might not fit but it does and my dog appreciates not sliding around on leather seats. I can still hook up her seat belt through the available openings and she can no longer release herself by stepping on the seat belt release.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette F. Bethel

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it’s worth it
customer_reviews.text: Protects back seat, but on first use it ripped out two seems on opposite side, may return it, dog is a Weimaraner
customer_reviews.author: E. Hoie

customer_reviews.title: Ugly but worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not going to lie, it’s kind of ugly and shows all the dirt. BUT, it’s incredibly easy to wash, scratch and bite resistant, and I love the hammock feature that keeps my pups safe! Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome well made product
customer_reviews.text: Very well made product. Fits perfectly. Can't stress enough how durable it feels and looks. Worth the low cost for sure. Highly recommend. If your considering this just buy it. Fits our Subaru outback like it was made for it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Nice cloth, very durable!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a cheaper, thinner car seat protector and it didn’t hold up to the motions of our dog during rides. The cheap clasps holding the cover up on the seats kept coming apart. This one is very durable and protects the car. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jake Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Pups love it
customer_reviews.text: Great cover. Fits perfectly in car and very secure. Dogs love to move around and it keeps them safe
customer_reviews.author: Andrea DeLorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Durable.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 70+ pound Pitties. This product has held up through 2 road trips and various local trips. The lighter color keeps it much cooler and is easy to keep clean (surprisingly). Buying another one for our other vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Pet Magasin Luxury Water-Resistant Pet Seat Cover & Scratch Proof Non-Slip Backing with Hammock Style for Cars & SUVs
feature_bullets: Luxury waterproof car seat cover of heavyweight cloth that protects the back seat of your car from pet fur, dirty and muddy footprints, water, and clawing damage
Size is 54" x 58"; big enough to fit most cars, trucks, and SUVs
Tough, heavyweight material, fully waterproof. Fits most cars with headrests. (Headrests are required for anchoring the seat cover.)
Quick-release clips for simple install and removal, easy to fold up and pack away when not needed.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
